sentences.english: Tinea cruris is a fungal pruritic dermatitis in the inguinal region.
sentences.chinese: 股癣是一种真菌在腹股沟区的瘙痒性皮炎。

sentences.english: Two of the most common skin conditions are the presence of moles and dermatitis .
sentences.chinese: 最常用的两种皮肤的条件是存在的鼹鼠和皮炎。

sentences.english: The person that weigh becomes repeatedly, develop to exfoliate even sexual dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 重者连成一片，甚至发展成剥脱性皮炎。

sentences.english: Blepharitis is often associated with systemic diseases such as rosacea or seborrheic dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 睑缘炎常常与全身性疾病如酒渣鼻或脂溢性皮炎相关。

sentences.english: These two are just the effects of dermatitis of your skin.
sentences.chinese: 这仅仅是影响性皮炎的皮肤。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of patch test in eyelid eczematous dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨斑贴试验在眼睑皮炎湿疹中的作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tranilast capsule is safe and effective in the treatment of atopic dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论曲尼司特胶囊治疗特应性皮炎安全有效。

sentences.english: Pruritus is an essential feature of atopic dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 瘙痒是特应性皮炎的一个基本特征。

sentences.english: Sheldon: There are no heroes when it comes to dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 有皮炎旳时候可不能逞英雄。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory effect of the stoma film to the contact dermatitis of the model mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨造口涂膜剂对接触性皮炎的治疗作用。

sentences.english: The histological findings of a skin biopsy were consistent with acute generalised exanthematous pustulosis.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤活检组织学检查符合急性泛发性脓疱性皮炎。

sentences.english: Side effects included the brief occurrence of irritant contact dermatitis and folliculitis during therapy.
sentences.chinese: 在治疗期间，会短暂发生的副作用包括皮炎和毛囊炎。

sentences.english: To elucidate the clinical features and effective treatment of jellyfish dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 探讨海蛰皮炎的特点及有效治疗方法。

sentences.english: Methods To sum-up and analysis the clinic information of 55 sufferers of dermatitis contacted mango.
sentences.chinese: 方法总结分析55例芒果皮炎的临床资料。

sentences.english: It is the presentation of the final dermal effect of the dermatitis which is different from the others.
sentences.chinese: 这是介绍的最后真皮效果性皮炎这是不同于其他人。

sentences.english: That is why we often speak of seborrheic dermatitis .
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们常说的脂溢性皮炎。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑
